name: files-shelf
title: Files Shelf
description: Batch move, copy, or rename files and folders from different directories
author: haythem_gataa

commands.name: add-to-shelf
commands.title: Add to Shelf
commands.description: Add selected Finder items to the shelf for batch operations

commands.name: view-shelf
commands.title: View Shelf
commands.description: View and manage items on the shelf

commands.name: copy-to-selection
commands.title: Copy Shelf to Folder
commands.subtitle: Selected or Open Finder Folder
commands.description: Copy all shelf items to the open Finder folder or a selected folder

commands.name: move-to-selection
commands.title: Move Shelf to Folder
commands.subtitle: Selected or Open Finder Folder
commands.description: Move all shelf items to the open Finder folder or a selected folder

commands.name: rename-shelf
commands.title: Rename Shelf Items
commands.description: Batch rename shelf items with prefix, suffix, numbering, or find/replace

preferences.name: keepShelfAfterCompletion
preferences.title: Keep Shelf After Completion
preferences.label: Keep shelf items after a successful copy/move/rename
preferences.description: When disabled (default), the shelf is cleared after all items are successfully processed.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
